General.Name: Rusolovo OAO
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Rusolovo, together its subsidiaries, engages in the mining and processing of tin ore in Russia. It is also involved in the production of other non-ferrous metals; and provision of financial services. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Moscow, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Rusolovo is a subsidiary of Public Joint-Stock Company Seligdar.

0.Name: Mr. Evgeniy Aleksandrovich Kolesov
0.Title: Gen. Director, Member of Management Board & Director
